subject: Re: Any insight on my life changing EVP experience?
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Actually, i had deleted all my previous posts from the group the 
other day.  Thanx for re-hashing this topic and keeping the 
negativity going.  I deleted my posts, because they should have been 
sent in a private e-mail and no longer felt it should be on a public 
forum.

-Steve



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, black bear hollow 
<blackbearhollow@...> wrote:
>
> Steve, drop it. You are wrong - as usual. If you have anything
> else to say to me, say it off list - or just keep your mouth shut.
> 
> Your attack was unnecessary and I'm sure no one needs you to 
police  
> this list.
> Misty is perfectly capable of doing that.
> 
> 
> On Dec 4, 2008, at 7:02 PM, Steve Hultay wrote:
> 
> > I only said that, because you have been attacking everyone that 
has
> > their own opinion for weeks now. Try doing some research. All you
> > do is wait to pounce on the next member that asks a basic 
question.
> > I guess i'll crawl back to my productive board now, where we 
actually
> > move forward with ideas and show our results with one another.
> > That's what this board used to be like until you took it over.
> >
> > -Steve
>
